Class MastermindController

  • java.lang.Object
    • MastermindController

  • public class MastermindController
extends java.lang.Object
    this is a class to control the model class this controller reads in a model. give user input string, this controller compere user input with answer and return if user input is right and how much user input was right
    Author:
    Feiran Yang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MastermindController(MastermindModel model)
      create a controller with read in model save answer in model into a map

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRightColorRightPlace(java.lang.String guess)
      return a value to indicate if user's input is how much digits did user guess is correct and in the right position by input string
      int getRightColorWrongPlace(java.lang.String guess)
      return a value to indicate if user's input is how much digits did user guess is correct but in wrong position by input string
      boolean isCorrect(java.lang.String guess)
      return a boolean value to indicate if user's input is correct by input string

      • getRightColorRightPlace

        public int getRightColorRightPlace(java.lang.String guess)
        return a value to indicate if user's input is how much digits did user guess is correct and in the right position by input string
        Parameters:
        guess - user's input guess
        Returns:
        user's input correctness
        Throws:
        MastermindIllegalLengthException - throws MastermindIllegalLengthException when user's input size is not 4
        MastermindIllegalColorException - throws MastermindIllegalColorException when user'inputed a char that is not a color
